sentences:
Sentence 0:
The ligand-bound aptamer structure is essentially the same in cells and in buffer at 1 mM Mg(2+), the approximate Mg(2+) concentration we measured in cells.
sentence_raw: The ligand-bound aptamer structure is essentially the same in cells and in buffer at 1 mM Mg(2+), the approximate Mg(2+) concentration we measured in cells.
